China jets scrambled in air zone

China says it has scrambled fighter jets to monitor US and Japanese planes inside its controversial new air defence zone around disputed islands.

  • Viewpoints: China air zone tensions
  • Why China air zone raises risk
  • Q&A: China-Japan islands row

EU rejects Russia 'veto' on Ukraine

The European Union warns Russia it will not allow it to "veto" deals in Eastern Europe, after a summit fails to revive an agreement with Ukraine.

  • Barroso criticises Russian influence Watch
  • Ukraine fails to reach EU deal Watch
  • Q&A: EU-Russia struggle
  • EU-Russia rivalry looms

German policeman in 'cannibal' case

A forensic scientist who works for Saxony's police is arrested after the dismembered body of a 59-year-old man is found buried on a plot of land south of Dresden.

Other Top Stories

  • S Africa row over Zuma house report

    South Africa's top corruption fighter condemns a newspaper for publishing extracts from her report, which allegedly says President Zuma should repay some of the $20m for upgrades to his house.

    Shootings, stabbing, robbery and brawls taint the Black Friday shopping frenzy, as bargain-hunters mob malls across the US.
